title: Career Fairs | Engineering Career Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Gain access to over 5,000 engineering students within the UIC College of Engineering at our Fall 2020 Engineering & Computer Science Career Fair in September 2020! Come to UIC to recruit from all of our engineering and computer science majors and connect with top talent in Chicago.
SAVE THE DATE! Virtual Fall 2020 Two-Day Engineering & Computer Science Career Fair
Day 1: September 22nd |12 – 4PM | Majors: Computer Science & Computer Engineering
Day 2: September 23rd |12 – 4PM | Majors: Bioengineering, Chemical, Civil, Electrical, Industrial, & Mechanical Engineering
Employer Registration Opens Summer 2020!
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, and social distancing measures in place by the state of Illinois, the Engineering Career Center will likely host a virtual career fair in Fall 2020.

We will update this website as soon as more details are confirmed. Thank you for your patience with us while we work to ensure a good recruitment experience for both employers and UIC engineering students.

The Engineering and Computer Science Career Fair is one of the largest career fairs at UIC. Previous Engineering and Computer Science Career Fairs have drawn over 100 companies and over 2,000 students to the career fair.
It is a wonderful opportunity for employers to recruit entry-level full-time engineers as well as summer interns, co-op students, or even part-time positions or contract positions.
We encourage you to review our Fall 2019 enrollment to learn more about the number of students in each engineering major at UIC.

Deadline to receive a refund for Ads is Monday, September 14th.
Career Fair Registration: A full refund will be provided if a cancellation is received by: Monday, September 14th at 5pm. Refunds will not be processed if an employer does not attend the fair.
Marketing Opportunities: A full refund will be provided if a cancellation is received by: Monday, September 14th at 5pm.
On Campus Interviews: Due to the high demand for on-campus interviews, cancellations will only be refunded up until Monday, September 14th at 5pm.
Inclement Weather: No refunds will be issued for cancellations caused by inclement weather, or other natural weather events that are outside of our control.

On-campus interviews will be hosted virtually by UIC following the career fair throughout the month of October. We strongly recommend registering early for on-campus interviews.

Please note that due to the high demand for virtual on-campus interviews, cancellations for on-campus interviews will only be refunded until Monday, September 14th at 5pm. Any employer who cancels virtual on-campus interviews after the September 14th deadline will not be refunded.
Questions about on-campus interviews? Please contact Rose Coppola-Conroy.
